# Battle Royale Game Project Instructions

## Project Overview
This is a multiplayer battle royale web game built with Three.js, TypeScript, and Socket.IO.

## Technology Stack
- Three.js - 3D rendering
- Cannon.js - Physics engine
- TypeScript - Type safety
- Vite - Build tool
- Socket.IO - Real-time multiplayer
- Node.js + Express - Backend server

## Project Status
- [x] Create copilot-instructions.md file
- [x] Scaffold project structure
- [x] Customize for battle royale game
- [x] Install dependencies
- [x] Compile and verify
- [x] Create documentation

## Development Commands
- `npm run dev` - Run both client and server in development mode
- `npm run dev:client` - Run client only on port 3000
- `npm run dev:server` - Run server only on port 3001
- `npm run build` - Build production version

## Project Structure
- `src/client/` - Frontend Three.js game code
- `src/server/` - Backend Socket.IO server
- `index.html` - Main HTML entry point
